    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurrentItemViewType()
      While there is currently running iteration process trough current optimized adapter's data set to obtain view for each of its data set items, this returns view type for the currently iterated position obtained from adapter by BaseAdapter.getItemViewType(int).
      android.view.View performOptimizedGetView(int position, android.view.View convertView, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Performs an optimized algorithm instead of the current optimized adapter's Adapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdapterOptimizer

        public AdapterOptimizer(AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter optimizedAdapter)

        Creates new instance of AdapterOptimizer.

        Parameters:
        optimizedAdapter - Adapter, of which Adapter.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup) should be optimized.

    • Method Detail

      • performOptimizedGetView

        public android.view.View performOptimizedGetView(int position,
                                        android.view.View convertView,
                                        android.view.ViewGroup parent)

        Performs an optimized algorithm instead of the current optimized adapter's Adapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) method.

        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item from the current optimized adapter's data set.
        convertView - The old view to reuse if possible. For more information see documentation of Adapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup).
        parent - The parent view, to that will be this view eventually assigned to.
        Returns:
        A view corresponding to the item at the specified position in the current optimized adapter's data set.

      • getCurrentItemViewType

        public int getCurrentItemViewType()

        While there is currently running iteration process trough current optimized adapter's data set to obtain view for each of its data set items, this returns view type for the currently iterated position obtained from adapter by BaseAdapter.getItemViewType(int).

        Returns:
        View type for the item's view from the current optimized adapter's data set at the currently iterated position.
